function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Lack of diversity in biophilic design practices","Impact":"Limited effectiveness of biophilic design in promoting sustainability in architecture","Mitigation":"Conducting comprehensive research to identify diverse biophilic design practices and their impacts on sustainability","Technologies":"Research and data analytics to assess the effectiveness of different biophilic design practices","People":"Architects, urban planners, and sustainability experts","Owner":"Research institutions, architectural firms, and organizations promoting sustainable architecture"},{"Description":"Lack of integration of subfields in architectural research","Impact":"Ineffective application of biophilic design elements in architecture","Mitigation":"Integration of subfields such as materiality, tectonics, mechanical systems, and mobility in biophilic design studies","Technologies":"Interdisciplinary collaboration and knowledge-sharing platforms for architects and researchers","People":"Architects, researchers, and experts in materiality, tectonics, mechanical systems, and mobility","Owner":"Architectural research institutions and interdisciplinary organizations"},{"Description":"Contested and ambiguous notion of 'Nature' in biophilic design","Impact":"Misinterpretation and misapplication of biophilic design concepts","Mitigation":"Critical examination and definition of 'Nature' within the context of biophilic design","Technologies":"Philosophical and interdisciplinary dialogues to redefine 'Nature' in the context of biophilic design","People":"Biophilic design experts, philosophers, and interdisciplinary scholars","Owner":"Biophilic design research institutions and academic organizations"}]}
